update.description:
Add TLS support for sendEmail, wget, out of kernel e1000e and igb network drivers.
Add again capi4k-utils plugins.
Disable traffic accounting with detail level High, always use Low.
Patch krb5-1.9.2 against MITKRB5-SA-2011-007. More gnupg-1.4.11 hardening. Patched ulogd-1.24.
Language updates.
Upgrade acpid to 2.0.14, apache httpd to 2.2.22, bash to 4.2.20, coreutils to 8.15, conntrack-tools to 1.0.1, DBD-SQLite to 1.35, diffutils to 3.2, freetype to 2.4.8, gmp to 5.0.2, grep to 2.10, iproute2 to 3.2.0, iptables to 1.4.12.2, iw to 3.3, kbd to 1.15.3, kernel to 2.6.32.57, libnetfilter_conntrack to 1.0.0, libnl to 3.2.7, libpcap to 1.2.1, libpng to 1.5.8, lzo to 2.0.6, ntp to 4.2.6p5, openldap to 2.4.28, openssl to 1.0.0g, openvpn to 2.2.2, pciutils-3.1.9, psmisc to 22.15, rrdtool to 1.4.7, rsyslog to 5.8.7, smartmontools to 5.42, Solos PCI to 1.03, sqlite to 3.7.10, squid to 3.1.19, tcpdump to 4.2.1, usbutils to 004, usb-modeswitch to 1.2.3, usb-modeswitch-data to 20120120, zlib to 1.2.6.
Mandatory reboot after upgrade.
